text:
If I try to specify "margin-left" property for table the output is invalid.
Content in table cells is shifted and it seems that difference is identical to
margin length. 
It seems that margin-left property is inherited (just assumption) but according
to XSL-FO spec. it is not inheritable.
creator: iistomin@ciklum.net
bowditch_chris@hotmail.com
text:
Actually your interpretation of the XSL-FO spec is incorrect. The behaviour 
you are observing is indent inheritence. This topic is discussed in some 
detail on the following Wiki page:

http://wiki.apache.org/xmlgraphics-fop/IndentInheritance

Please, if you have any further questions relating to FOP's behaviour can you 
ask them on the fop-user mailing list, instead of just raising bugs. 

Thank you,

Chris

creator: jeremias@apache.org
text: *** Bug 39882 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
creator: gadams@apache.org
